sentences.en: Because of the particularity of its nature, the workers whose jobs interment enjoy low prestige.
sentences.cn: 由于工作性质的特殊性, 从事这行业的职工职业声望低.

sentences.en: His brother was taken prisoner during the war and was shut in a unknown interment camp.
sentences.cn: 他的弟弟在战争中被俘,关到某地一所不为人知的俘虏营里.

sentences.en: Please avoid walking across interment sections except to visit interment spaces.
sentences.cn: 除访问土葬用地外,请避免步行跨越土葬区.

sentences.en: Please limit placements to no more than three per interment space.
sentences.cn: 请限制配售不超过百分之三土葬空间.

sentences.en: Pleaseavoid parking in front of an open interment site unless you arepart of a funeral procession.
sentences.cn: 请避免将车停在前边的一处墓葬园,除非您是送葬.

sentences.en: The funeral was held Monday afternoon from Reavie Brothers Funeral and interment was in Bethel Cemetery.
sentences.cn: 葬礼于星期一下午在雷维兄弟殡仪馆举行,然后埋葬在圣地墓地中.

sentences.en: The interment will be at Hyde Park - the President's New York estate - on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 葬礼将于周日举行，届时总统下葬在他纽约的庄园——海德公园中。

trans.tran_en: the act of burying a dead body
